00030 #include "run.h"
00031 
00032 Run::Run(QString prefix_id, QString prefix_dir, QString winedll_path, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     setupUi(this);
00035 
00036     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00037     settings.beginGroup("app");
00038         loadThemeIcons(settings.value("theme").toString());
00039     settings.endGroup();
00040 
00041     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00042     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00043     connect(cmdGetProgramBin, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetProgram_Click()));
00044     connect(cmdGetWorkDir, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetWorkDir_Click()));
00045     connect(cmdAdd, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdAdd_Click()));
00046 
00047     connect(comboPrefixes, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged (int)), this, SLOT(comboPrefixes_indexChanged (int)));
00048     connect(cbUseConsole, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int)));
00049 
00050     connect(twbGeneral, SIGNAL(currentChanged(int)), this, SLOT(ResizeContent(int)));
00051 
00052     cmdGetProgramBin->installEventFilter(this);
00053     cmdGetWorkDir->installEventFilter(this);
00054 
00055     if (prefix_id.isEmpty()){
00056         QSqlQuery query;
00057         query.exec("SELECT id, path FROM prefix WHERE name=\"Default\"");
00058         query.first();
00059         this->prefix_id=query.value(0).toString();
00060         this->prefix_dir=query.value(1).toString();
00061         query.clear();
00062     } else {
00063         this->prefix_id=prefix_id;
00064         this->prefix_dir=prefix_dir;
00065     }
00066 
00067     getPrefixes();
00068 
00069     return;
00070 }

00074 void Run::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00075     QPixmap pixmap;
00076 
00077     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00078         pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00079     }
00080 
00081     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00082 
00083     cmdGetProgramBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00084     cmdGetWorkDir->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00085 
00086     return;
00087 }

00089 
00090 QIcon Run::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00091     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00092     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00093 
00094     QIcon icon;
00095 
00096     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00097         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00098         if (icon.isNull()){
00099             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00100         }
00101     } else {
00102         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00103     }
00104 
00105     return icon;
00106 }

00109 void Run::cmdCancel_Click(){
00110     reject();
00111     return;
00112 }

00114 void Run::cmdAdd_Click(){
00115     if (!cboxDlls->currentText().isEmpty()){
00116         twDlls->insertRow (0);
00117         QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxDlls->currentText());
00118         twDlls->setItem(0, 0, newItem);
00119         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00120         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxOveride->currentText());
00121         twDlls->setItem(0, 1, newItem);
00122         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00123     }
00124 
00125     twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00126     twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00127     twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00128     return;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void Run::cmdOk_Click(){
00132 
00133     QString override;
00134     for (int i=1; i<=twDlls->rowCount(); i++){
00135         override.append(tr("%1=").arg(twDlls->item(i-1, 0)->text()));
00136         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native"))
00137             override.append("n;");
00138         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin"))
00139             override.append("b;");
00140         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native, Buildin"))
00141             override.append("n,b;");
00142         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin, Native"))
00143             override.append("b,n;");
00144     }
00145 
00146 
00147     execObj.execcmd = txtProgramBin->text();
00148 
00149     QSqlQuery query;
00150 
00151     query.prepare("SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:name");
00152     query.bindValue(":name", comboPrefixes->currentText());
00153     query.exec();
00154     query.first();
00155 
00156     execObj.prefixid = query.value(0).toString();
00157 
00158     query.clear();
00159 
00160 
00161     if (cbUseConsole->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00162         execObj.useconsole = "1";
00163     } else {
00164         execObj.useconsole = "0";
00165     }
00166     execObj.cmdargs = txtCmdArgs->text();
00167     execObj.override = override;
00168     execObj.winedebug = txtWinedebug->text();
00169     execObj.display = txtDisplay->text();
00170     execObj.wrkdir = txtWorkDir->text();
00171     execObj.nice = txtNice->text();
00172     execObj.desktop = txtDesktopSize->text();
00173 
00174     accept();
00175     return;
00176 }
00177 
00178 bool Run::eventFilter( QObject *object, QEvent *event )
00179 {
00180    //  firstly, check whether the object is the QTableWidget and if it's a mouse press event
00181     if (object == twDlls)
00182         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00183     {   // if yes, we need to cast the event
00184         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
00185         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete)
00186             twDlls->removeRow(twDlls->currentRow());
00187 
00188         return true;
00189     }
00190 
00191     return QWidget::eventFilter(object, event);
00192 }
00193 
00194 void Run::getWineDlls(QString winedll_path){
00195     /*
00196      * This function Builds Wine dll list for selected prefix
00197      */
00198 
00199     cboxDlls->clear();
00200 
00201     if (winedll_path.isEmpty()){
00202         QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00203         settings.beginGroup("wine");
00204         winedll_path=settings.value("WineLibs").toString();
00205         settings.endGroup();
00206     }
00207 
00208     QDir dir(winedll_path);
00209     dir.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00210 
00211     QFileInfoList list = dir.entryInfoList();
00212     for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00213         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00214         if (fileInfo.fileName().indexOf(".dll.so")>=0){
00215             cboxDlls->addItem ( fileInfo.fileName().left(fileInfo.fileName().length()-3));
00216         }
00217     }
00218 
00219     cboxDlls->setMaxVisibleItems (10);
00220 
00221     return;
00222 }
00223 
00224 void Run::getPrefixes(){
00225     /*
00226      * Getting prefixes and set default
00227      */
00228 
00229     QSqlQuery query;
00230 
00231     query.exec("SELECT name, id, wine_dllpath, path FROM prefix");
00232     while (query.next()){
00233         comboPrefixes->addItem(query.value(0).toString());
00234 
00235         if (query.value(1).toString()==prefix_id){
00236             comboPrefixes->setCurrentIndex ( comboPrefixes->findText(query.value(0).toString()) );
00237             getWineDlls(query.value(2).toString());
00238             prefix_dir=query.value(3).toString();
00239             if (prefix_dir.isEmpty()){
00240                 prefix_dir.append(QDir::homePath());
00241                 prefix_dir.append("/.wine/drive_c/");
00242             } else {
00243                 prefix_dir.append("/drive_c/");
00244             }
00245         }
00246     }
00247 
00248     query.clear();
00249     return;
00250 }
00251 
00252 void Run::comboPrefixes_indexChanged (int){
00253     /*
00254      * If user select prefix -- rebuild wine dlls list
00255      */
00256 
00257     QSqlQuery query;
00258 
00259     query.prepare("SELECT wine_dllpath, path FROM prefix WHERE name=:name");
00260     query.bindValue(":name", comboPrefixes->currentText());
00261     query.exec();
00262     query.first();
00263 
00264     getWineDlls(query.value(0).toString());
00265     prefix_dir=query.value(1).toString();
00266     query.clear();
00267 
00268     if (prefix_dir.isEmpty()){
00269         prefix_dir.append(QDir::homePath());
00270         prefix_dir.append("/.wine/drive_c/");
00271     } else {
00272         prefix_dir.append("/drive_c/");
00273     }
00274 
00275     return;
00276 }

00281 
00282 void Run::cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int){
00283     switch(cbUseConsole->checkState()){
00284         case Qt::PartiallyChecked:
00285             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00286             break;
00287         case Qt::Checked:
00288             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00289             break;
00290         case Qt::Unchecked:
00291             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(FALSE);
00292             break;
00293     }
00294 
00295     return;
00296 }

00298 void Run::ResizeContent(int TabIndex){
00299     switch (TabIndex){
00300         case 1:
00301             twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00302             twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00303             twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00304         break;
00305     }
00306 
00307     return;
00308 }

00310 void Run::cmdGetProgram_Click(){
00311 
00312     QString fileName;
00313     QString searchPath=prefix_dir;
00314 
00315     if (!txtProgramBin->text().isEmpty()){
00316         if (!txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty()){
00317         searchPath=txtWorkDir->text();
00318         } else {
00319         searchPath=txtProgramBin->text().left(txtProgramBin->text().length() - txtProgramBin->text().split("/").last().length());;
00320         }
00321     }
00322 
00323     if ((!QDir(searchPath).exists()) or (searchPath.isEmpty())){
00324         if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00325            searchPath=prefix_dir;
00326         } else {
00327            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00328         }
00329      }
00330 
00331     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00332     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00333     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00334        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00335 
00336     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00337         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00338 
00339     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00340     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00341 
00342     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00343       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden | QDir::Files );
00344       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Exe file"));
00345       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00346       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00347       dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Exe files (*.exe)"));
00348       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00349 
00350      if (dialog.exec())
00351         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00352 
00353     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00354         QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00355         txtProgramBin->setText(fileName);
00356 
00357         QString wrkDir;
00358         wrkDir = fileName.left(fileName.length() - list1.last().length());
00359         txtWorkDir->setText(wrkDir);
00360     }
00361 
00362     return;
00363 }
00364 
00365 void Run::cmdGetWorkDir_Click(){
00366     QString searchPath=prefix_dir;
00367     QString fileName;
00368 
00369     if ((!txtProgramBin->text().isEmpty()) and (QDir().exists(txtProgramBin->text()))){
00370         searchPath=txtProgramBin->text().left(txtProgramBin->text().length() - txtProgramBin->text().split("/").last().length());;
00371     }
00372 
00373     if (!QDir(searchPath).exists()){
00374         if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00375            searchPath=prefix_dir;
00376         } else {
00377            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00378         }
00379      }
00380 
00381     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00382     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00383     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00384        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00385 
00386     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00387         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00388 
00389     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00390     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00391 
00392     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00393       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden);
00394 
00395       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::Directory);
00396       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Directory"));
00397       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00398           // This option wirksonly it qt 4.5. In fact this not works correctly with QDir::Hidden,  so I comment it out for a some  time
00399           //dialog.setOption(QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly, true);
00400 
00401       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00402      if (dialog.exec())
00403         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00404 
00405     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00406         txtWorkDir->setText(fileName);
00407     }
00408     return;
00409 }
